entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
